Attribue.name: border-radius
Attribue.description: controls natures of an elements corners

Attribue.name: border-style
Attribue.description: Specifies the style of the border (dotted or dashed or solid or etc)

Attribue.name: padding
Attribue.description: adds space inside a box with only background of said box

Attribue.name: position
Attribue.description: Controls How placement is read (can also "fix" an elemeent)
